title: How hard can it be? BBC Top Gear's 10 best challenges
text:
BBC Top Gear is one of the greatest programmes in the history of television. Whether you like the 'new' version or not, the Clarkson, Hammond and May era of the show remains the largest and most successful TV franchise in the world, watched by millions every week and consumed in countries all over the world.

Those days are, arguably, behind us. Jeremy Clarkson's departure from the BBC and viewers' tepid response to Amazon's Grand Tour means that the heyday of automotive TV is probably over. So we're reminiscing, thinking back to the most memorable specials and challenges from this bygone age of television.
